snapshot

CountSeries snapshot(ICounter.DateSpan dateSpan)
Returns a CountSeries that is a snapshot of the counter's values for the given dateSpan. (Further changes to this counter won't be reflected in the CountSeries that comes back.)

Parameters:
dateSpan -
